headline: Supporting Those With Pediatric Cancer and Blood Disorders Today and Into the Future
summary: Originally published on Aflac Newsroom NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / October 6, 2025 / In honor of Childhood Cancer and Sickle Cell Awareness Month in September, we spoke with Georgia teenager Charlaye, who deals with the challenges of sickle ...

headline: Aflac offers premium grace period for some federal government employees
summary: Aflac Incorporated (NYSE: AFL) announced today that it is offering a grace period for premium payments from policyholders employed by the Federal government who are not receiving pay during the government shutdown. This grace period will extend until payroll resumes for these government employees. Eligible policyholders may inquire about the grace period by calling (888) 515-1941.
